name: Parhelion
description:
Hello! Welcome to Soraki Island ~
This is a role -playing game and a visual novel game.You can experience a story through this game to get entertainment and relaxation.

Here you will play a traveler to conduct exchanges, interaction and exploration discovery on the island. You need to put together the truth and the story behind Soraki in the real or fake information fragments.

Player operation: Keyboard (→ ← ↑↓ , etc., detailed key operations will be explained in the game)
In short, thank you for your willingness to play this game!! ^^
